verbs.description: The admissions [V: were] recorded during a probe into the firm , which was hired by President Trump ’s 2016 campaign .
[ARG1: The admissions] were [V: recorded] [ARGM-TMP: during a probe into the firm , which was hired by President Trump ’s 2016 campaign] .
The admissions were recorded during a probe into the firm , which [V: was] hired by President Trump ’s 2016 campaign .
The admissions were recorded during a probe into [ARG1: the firm] , [R-ARG1: which] was [V: hired] [ARG0: by President Trump ’s 2016 campaign] .
